endemo2.input.control_parameters.ControlParameters¶

class ControlParameters(general_settings, industry_settings)[source]¶

Bases: object

The ControlParameter class holds the data given by the Set_and_Control_Parameters.xlsx file. It is split in general settings, and settings for each sector, indicating non-overlapping parameters for our model.

Variables:

  • general_settings (GeneralSettings) – The settings contained in the “GeneralSettings”-sheet.

  • industry_settings (IndustrySettings) – The settings contained in the “IND_*”-sheets.

Methods

__init__
